newsitem.title: USA: Stewart says no gas turbine orders in Feb.
newsitem.headline: Stewart says no gas turbine orders in Feb.

text.p: Stewart & Stevenson Services Inc on Wednesday said it received no orders for gas turbine power generators or compression equipment during February.

"Bid and proposal activity for gas turbine equipment remains extremely active, and it would be a mistake to draw any conclusion about the market based on one quarter's, much less one month's orders," the company said in a release.
The company said it received about $305 million of gas turbine equipment orders during the prior three quarters.
